mapper.select: SELECT workline.employee_no, workline.score FROM t_work_record_total workmaster, t_work_record workline,t_store WHERE workmaster.id = workline.workrecord_id and workmaster.store_id = t_store.store_id and workmaster.commit_status = 3 and workmaster.work_month =#{work_month} and t_store.name =#{storename} order by employee_no desc
